WITH BOOKABLE_MOVIES AS ( SELECT m.MOVIE_NO, m.TITLE, SUM(r.RESERVATION_VISITOR) AS VISITOR_COUNT FROM MOVIE_TBL m LEFT JOIN RESERVATION_TBL r ON m.MOVIE_NO = r.MOVIE_NO WHERE m.IS_BOOKABLE = 'Y' GROUP BY m.MOVIE_NO, m.TITLE ), TOTAL_VISITORS AS ( SELECT SUM(VISITOR_COUNT) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM BOOKABLE_MOVIES ) SELECT bm.MOVIE_NO AS movieNo, bm.TITLE AS title, bm.VISITOR_COUNT AS visitorCount, tv.TOTAL_COUNT AS totalCount, ROUND((bm.VISITOR_COUNT / tv.TOTAL_COUNT) * 100, 2) AS reservationRate FROM BOOKABLE_MOVIES bm, TOTAL_VISITORS tv ORDER BY reservationRate DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.STILLCUT_NO, s.STILLCUT_URL, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY s.STILLCUT_NO) AS ROW_NUM FROM MOVIE_STILLCUT_TBL s WHERE s.MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} ) WHERE ROW_NUM > #{offset} AND ROW_NUM <= (#{offset} + #{size})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT r.REVIEW_NO, r.MOVIE_NO, r.MEMBER_ID, r.SCORE, r.REVIEW_CONTENT, r.REG_DATE, r.UPDATE_DATE, p.PROFILE_IMG_NO, p.FILE_NAME, p.FILE_RENAME, p.FILE_PATH FROM REVIEW_TBL r LEFT JOIN PROFILE_IMG_TBL p ON p.MEMBER_ID = r.MEMBER_ID WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} ORDER BY r.REG_DATE DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{offset} + #{size} ) WHERE rn > #{offset}
